name: EZ GAME
description: Survive and earn highest point by killing some mob(fireball) in the games. Aiko Chan will be the anime character(PS : Self made character) you use in the game. Be careful of the enemy which will decrease your points you earn and attack you until you're out of Health point. Caution: health point will NOT be shown in the game. You can only determine the points keep decreasing when you take damage from enemy.
